trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Pontiac
There were no other sightings in Pontiac on or around May 31st 2000
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting at a red light and noticed a grey, egg shaped craft coming fromthe north. It was flying lower than any airplane I have ever seen and I couldsee it very clearly. It had rectangular 22bumps 22 on it and didnt make asound. I was excited and wanted to get out of my car and get other people tolook but I would have been too embarrassed. The object never did anythingspecial and continued to fly in a straight path until I could no longer see it(it was so low that a 1 story building blocked sight of it). I told my familyabout it but havent told anyone else until now.
